original_text: If anyone does not remain in me, that person is like a dead branch. The gardener will throw that branch away and it will die. People throw all those dead branches into the fire so that they burn.
korean_text: 사람이 내 안에 거하지 아니하면 가지처럼 밖에 버려져 마르나니 사람들이 그것을 모아다가 불에 던져 사르느니라

sentences.original_text: If anyone does not remain in me
that person is like a dead branch
The gardener will throw that branch away
sentences.korean_translation: 농부가 그 가지를 던져 버릴 것이요

sentences.original_text: People throw all those dead branches into the fire
sentences.korean_translation: 사람들이 그 모든 마른 가지들을 불에 던지고
